problem:
VS = float(random.choice([5, 10, 15])) E12=[10, 12, 15, 18, 22, 27, 33, 39, 47, 56, 68, 82] mult = float(random.choice([1, 10, 100, 1000])) R1 = float(random.choice(E12))*mult R2 = float(random.choice(E12))*mult
VTH = VS*(R2/(R1+R2)) RTH = (R1*R2)/(R1+R2)
Given the circuit below with the indicated terminals, you will construct a Thevenin equivalent circuit.
The device parameters of the circuit to be modeled are \(V_S=$VS\)V, \(R_1=$R1\Omega\), and \(R_2=$R2\Omega\).
What is the Thevenin open-circuit voltage (in Volts) \(V_{TH}\)?
What is the Thevnin equivalent resistance (in Ohms) \(R_{TH}\)?
